---
title: "About"
---

rendseq is an open source python package developed by the Li Lab at MIT.  [Visit our lab website](https://www.genesgroup.org/) to learn more about what we are up to!

Rend-seq data is a type of RNA-sequencing data that can aid in the identification of transcript boundaries by enriching for transcript ends.  We have created an interactive website for viewing Rend-seq data: [rendseq.org](https://rendseq.org/).
